freeDelivery: Free delivery on orders over 150 TND
freeReturns: Returns: Free returns within 30 days of purchase
returnConditions: Items must be in original condition with tags attached
creditDebitCards: Credit & Debit Cards: Visa, Mastercard (works in Tunisia and internationally)
paypal: PayPal: Pay securely with your PayPal account
bankTransfer: Bank Transfer: Direct bank transfer available
cashOnDelivery: Cash on Delivery: Pay when you receive your order
storeCollection: Store Collection: You can collect your order from our store
securePayment: All payments are processed securely with SSL encryption
